name: Smack Down
effect: Ranged. Remove the foe's Immunity to Ground-Type Attacks for the rest of the scene. If hitting a pokemon in the invulnerable Aerial turn of Fly or Bounce, this interrupts the move and forces them back to the floor but doesn't remove Ground Immunities they may have.
description: The user hurls a projectile, usually a heavy rock that sends the foe down to the ground, leaving it unable to take off the ground afterwards.
